TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Site de fouilles[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la science de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un sito di scavo per incrementare la ricerca nella tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Wybuduj wykopaliska by zwiększyć poziom nauki w Twoich miastach.

TEXT.English: Triceratops is the best known genus of the Ceratopsidae, a family of large North American horned dinosaurs. The exact location of Triceratops among the ceratopsians has been debated over the years.
TEXT.Italian: Triceratops è la specie più nota tra i Ceratopsidae, una famiglia di grandi dinosauri nordamericani con corni. La classificazione esatta dei triceratopi tra i ceratopsians è stata oggetto di discussione per molti anni.

TEXT.English: Dig Site (Dimetrodon Fossils)
TEXT.French: Site de fouilles (Fossiles de Dimétrodon)
TEXT.Italian: Sito di scavo (Fossili di Dimetrodon)
TEXT.Polish: Wykopaliska (Skamniałości Dimetrodona)

TEXT.English: Build a Dig Site to increase your cities science.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Site de fouilles[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la science de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un sito di scavo per incrementare la ricerca nella tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Wybuduj wykopaliska by zwiększyć poziom nauki w Twoich miastach.

TEXT.English: Dimetrodon was a predatory synapsid genus that flourished during the Permian period, living between 280 - 265 million years ago.
TEXT.Italian: Dimetrodon era un predatore diffuso durante il periodo Permiano, che visse tra 280 e 265 milioni di anni fa.

TEXT.English: Dig Site (Archaeopteryx Fossils)
TEXT.French: Site de fouilles (Fossiles d'Archaeoptéryx)
TEXT.Italian: Sito di scavo (Fossili di Archaeopteryx)
TEXT.Polish: Wykopaliska (Skamniałości Archaeopteryxa)

TEXT.English: Build a Dig Site to increase your cities science.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Site de fouilles[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la science de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un sito di scavo per incrementare la ricerca nella tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Wybuduj wykopaliska by zwiększyć poziom nauki w Twoich miastach.

TEXT.English: Archaeopteryx is a genus of theropod dinosaur that is closely related to birds. Since the late 19th century, it has been generally accepted by palaeontologists, and celebrated in lay reference works, as being the oldest known bird, though some more recent studies have cast doubt on this assessment, finding that it is instead a non-avialan dinosaur closely related to the origin of birds.
TEXT.Italian: Archaeopteryx era una specie di dinosauri molto simile agli uccelli. Dalla fine del 19° secolo è stato accettato da tutti i paleontologi come l'uccello più antico di cui si abbia notizia; tuttavia, alcuni studi recenti ritengono che sia un rettile molto simile ai primi uccelli.

TEXT.English: Dig Site (Smilodon Fossils)
TEXT.Italian: Sito di scavo (Fossili di Smilodon)
TEXT.Polish: Wykopaliska (Skamniałości Smilodona)

TEXT.English: Build a Dig Site to increase your cities science.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Site de fouilles[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la science de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un sito di scavo per incrementare la ricerca nella tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Wybuduj wykopaliska by zwiększyć poziom nauki w Twoich miastach.

TEXT.English: Smilodon, often called a saber-toothed cat or incorrectly a saber-toothed tiger, is an extinct genus of machairodonts. This saber-toothed cat was endemic to North America and South America, living from near the beginning through the very end of the Pleistocene epoch.
TEXT.Italian: Lo smilodonte, o tigre dai denti a sciabola, era una specie estinta dei machairodonti. Questo felino era originario del continente americano; visse dall'inizio alla fine dell'era Pleistocene.

TEXT.English: Dig Site (Ichthyostega Fossils)
TEXT.Italian: Sito di scavo (Fossili di Ichthyostega)
TEXT.Polish: Wykopaliska (Skamniałości Ichthyostega)

TEXT.English: Build a Dig Site to increase your cities science.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Site de fouilles[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la science de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un sito di scavo per incrementare la ricerca nella tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Wybuduj wykopaliska by zwiększyć poziom nauki w Twoich miastach.

TEXT.English: Ichthyostega is an early tetrapod genus that lived at the end of the Upper Devonian period. It was a labyrinthodont, one of the first fossil record of tetrapods. Ichthyostega possessed lungs and limbs that helped it navigate through shallow water in swamps. Though undoubtedly of amphibian build and habit, it is not considered a true member of the group in the narrow sense, as the first true amphibians appeared in the Carboniferous period.
TEXT.Italian: Ichthyostega era uno dei primi esemplari dei tetrapodi che comparve alla fine del Devoniano Superiore. Era un labyrinthodont, uno dei primi esempi fossili di tetrapode. Ichthyostega possedeva polmoni e arti che lo aiutavano a navigare attraverso le acque poco profonde nelle paludi. Anche se indubbiamente anfibio, non è considerato un vero e proprio membro del gruppo in senso stretto, dato che i primi veri anfibi apparvero nel periodo Carbonifero.

TEXT.English: Dig Site (Pterodactyl Fossils)
TEXT.French: Site de fouilles (Fossiles de Ptérodactyles)
TEXT.Italian: Sito di scavo (Fossili di Pterodattili)
TEXT.Polish: Wykopaliska (Skamniałości Pterodactyla)

TEXT.English: Build a Dig Site to increase your cities science.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Site de fouilles[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la science de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un sito di scavo per incrementare la ricerca nella tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Wybuduj wykopaliska by zwiększyć poziom nauki w Twoich miastach.

TEXT.English: Pterodactylus is a genus of pterosaurs, whose members are popularly known as pterodactyls. It was the first to be named and identified as a flying reptile.
TEXT.Italian: Lo pterodattilo era una specie di pterosaurs, i cui membri sono noti più comunemente come pterodattili. Fu il primo rettile volante identificato con certezza.

TEXT.English: Dig Site (Neanderthal Fossils)
TEXT.French: Site de fouilles (Fossiles de Néanderthaliens)
TEXT.Italian: Sito di scavo (Fossili di Neanderthal)
TEXT.Polish: Wykopaliska (Skamniałości Neanderthalczyka)

TEXT.English: Build a Dig Site to increase your cities science.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Site de fouilles[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la science de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un sito di scavo per incrementare la ricerca nella tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Wybuduj wykopaliska by zwiększyć poziom nauki w Twoich miastach.

TEXT.English: The Neanderthal is an extinct member of the Homo genus known from Pleistocene specimens found in Europe and parts of western and central Asia.
TEXT.Italian: I Neanderthal sono una specie estinta del genere Homo, diffusi durante il Pleistocene in Europa e in parte dell'Asia centro-occidentale.

TEXT.English: Toxic Waste Dump
TEXT.German: Giftmülldeponie
TEXT.Italian: Discarica di rifiuti tossici
TEXT.Polish: Składowisko Toksycznych Odpadów

TEXT.English: Toxic Waste Dumps are needed before Nuclear Power Plants can be constructed.
TEXT.French: une Décharge de déchets toxiquess are needed before Nuclear Power Plants can be constructed.
TEXT.Italian: Prima di costruire centrali termonucleari, è necessario costruire una discarica di rifiuti tossici dove stoccare le scorie.

TEXT.English: Toxic waste is waste material that can cause death or injury to living creatures. It can be spread quite easily and contaminate lakes and rivers. The term is often used interchangeably with hazardous waste, or discarded material that can pose a long-term risk to health or environment.[NEWLINE]As with most pollution problems, toxic waste began to be a significant issue during the industrial revolution. It is usually the product of industry or commerce, but comes also from residential use (e.g. cleaning products, cosmetics, lawn care products), agriculture (e.g. chemical fertilizers, pesticides), the military (nuclear weapons testing, chemical warfare, medical facilities (e.g. pharmaceuticals), radioactive sources, and light industry, such as dry cleaning establishments.
TEXT.Italian: I rifiuti tossici sono materiali di scarto che possono causare morte o lesioni alle creature viventi. Possono diffondersi molto facilmente, contaminando laghi e fiumi. Il termine è spesso usato in modo intercambiabile con Rifiuti pericolosi, oppure materiali che possono rappresentare un rischio a lungo termine per la salute o l'ambiente. [NEWLINE] Come con la maggior parte dei problemi di inquinamento, rifiuti tossici hanno cominciato ad essere un problema significativo durante la rivoluzione industriale. Sono di solito prodotti dell'industria o del commercio, ma provengono anche da case residenziali (ad esempio, prodotti per la pulizia, cosmetici, prodotti per la cura del prato), l'agricoltura (ad esempio fertilizzanti chimici, pesticidi), i militari (test di armi nucleari e chimiche), strutture mediche (ad esempio, i prodotti farmaceutici), sorgenti radioattive e l'industria leggera, come le attività di lavaggio a secco.
TEXT.Polish: Oprócz, zużytego paliwa jądrowego z elektrowni jądrowych, odpadów powstających przy ponownym uzdatnianiu paliwa jądrowego (stanowiących najmniejszą objętościowo część odpadów promieniotwórczych), zalicza się do odpadów promieniotwórczych również inne materiały, które zostały skażone promieniotwórczo. Materiały te zostają najczęściej skażone w procesach produkcyjnych elektrowni jądrowych, w medycynie, przemyśle i w wyniku przeprowadzanych badań naukowych.

TEXT.English: Garbage Collection Agency
TEXT.German: Entsorgungsbehörde
TEXT.Italian: Ente per la raccolta dei rifiuti
TEXT.Polish: MPO

TEXT.English: Build a Garbage Collection Agency to help organize trash flow from point A to Point B.
TEXT.French: Construisez une [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Agence de Collecte des Ordures[COLOR_REVERT] pour aider à l'organisation du déplacement des ordures.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un ente per la raccolta dei rifiutu per organizzare il flusso di rifiuti dal punto A al punto B.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Garbage Collection Agency to help organize trash flow from point A to Point B.

TEXT.English: Waste collection is the component of waste management which results in the passage of a waste material from the source of production to either the point of treatment or final disposal. Waste collection also includes the kerbside collection of recyclable materials that technically are not waste, as part of a municipal landfill diversion program.
TEXT.Italian: La raccolta dei rifiuti è la componente di gestione dei rifiuti che comporta il passaggio di un materiale di scarto dalla fonte di produzione al punto di trattamento o di smaltimento finale. La raccolta dei rifiuti comprende anche la raccolta differenziata porta a porta dei materiali riciclabili che tecnicamente non sono rifiuti, come parte di un programma per svuotare le discariche.
TEXT.Polish: Miejskie Przedsiębiorstwo Oczyszczalnia

TEXT.English: Landfill
TEXT.German: Müllhalde
TEXT.Italian: Discarica a cielo aperto
TEXT.Polish: Wysypisko Śmieci

TEXT.English: A giant landfill may be unappealing to local residents, but all other cities become cleaner for it.
TEXT.Italian: Una gigantesca discarica a cielo aperto può sembrare poco attraente per i residenti locali, ma tutte le altre città ne ottengono benefici.

TEXT.English: A landfill, also known as a dump (and historically as a midden), is a site for the disposal of waste materials by burial and is the oldest form of waste treatment. Historically, landfills have been the most common methods of organised waste disposal and remain so in many places around the world.[NEWLINE]Landfills may include internal waste disposal sites (where a producer of waste carries out their own waste disposal at the place of production) as well as sites used by many producers. Many landfills are also used for other waste management purposes, such as the temporary storage, consolidation and transfer, or processing of waste material (sorting, treatment, or recycling).
TEXT.French: A landfill, also known as a dump (and historically as a midden), is a site for the disposal of waste materials by burial and is the oldest form of waste treatment. Historically, landfills have been the most common methods of organised waste disposal and remain so in many places around the world.[NEWLINE]une Décharge à ciel ouverts may include internal waste disposal sites (where a producer of waste carries out their own waste disposal at the place of production) as well as sites used by many producers. Many landfills are also used for other waste management purposes, such as the temporary storage, consolidation and transfer, or processing of waste material (sorting, treatment, or recycling).
TEXT.Italian: Una discarica è un sito per lo smaltimento dei rifiuti mediante sotterramento ed è la più antica forma di trattamento dei rifiuti stessi. Storicamente, le discariche sono state i metodi più comuni di smaltimento dei rifiuti, tanto che in molti luoghi in tutto il mondo vengono costruite ancora oggi. [NEWLINE] Le discariche possono includere siti di smaltimento dei rifiuti interni (in cui un produttore di rifiuti provvede allo smaltimento dei propri rifiuti nei luoghi di produzione), così come siti utilizzati da molti produttori. Molte discariche sono utilizzate anche per altri scopi di gestione dei rifiuti, come ad esempio il deposito temporaneo, il consolidamento e il trasferimento o la trasformazione di materiali di scarto (cernita, trattamento o riciclaggio).
TEXT.Polish: Składowisko odpadów, potocznie wysypisko śmieci - to zlokalizowany i urządzony zgodnie z przepisami obiekt zorganizowanego deponowaniaodpadów. Pojęcie składowisko obejmuje również wylewisko odpadów ciekłych,wysypisko odpadów komunalnych, a także zwałowiska mas ziemnych. Składowanie odpadów może odbywać się wyłącznie w miejscu do tego wyznaczonym. Niekiedy w tym samym miejscu prowadzi się też selekcję i częściowy odzysk surowców wtórnych. Właścicielem składowiska jest zazwyczaj miejscowy samorząd terytorialny.

TEXT.English: Garbage Dock

French.Text: Quai de plongée pour les Ordures

TEXT.Italian: Banchina di carico per i rifiuti
TEXT.Polish: Dok Wywozu Odpadków

TEXT.English: Build a Garbage Dock to increase your cities health.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Quai de plongée pour les Ordures[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la santé de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci una banchina di carico per i rifiuti per incrementare la salute della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Garbage Dock by poprawić jakość zdrowia Twoich poddanych w miastach.

TEXT.English: Throwing your trash into the ocean.
TEXT.French: Les déchets sont jetés dans les océans.
TEXT.Italian: Getta i tuoi rifiuti nell'oceano.
TEXT.Polish: Odpady klasyfikuje się w zależności od źródeł powstawania, stopnia uciążliwości bądź stwarzania zagrożeń dla życia lub zdrowia ludzi oraz dla środowiska. W problematyce dotyczącej ochrony środowiska rozpatruje się i klasyfikuje odpady, jako substancje pochodzące zprodukcji lub konsumpcji, które zanieczyszczają środowisko.

TEXT.English: Junkyard
TEXT.Italian: Deposito di rottami
TEXT.Polish: Złomowisko

TEXT.English: Build a Junkyard to increase your cities wealth.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ferrailleur[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la richesse de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un deposito di rottami per incrementare la ricchezza della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Junkyard by zwiększyć bogactwo w Twoich miastach.

TEXT.English: A junkyard is the location of a business in dismantling where wrecked or decommissioned vehicles are brought, their usable parts are sold for use in operating vehicles, while the unusable metal parts, known as scrap metal parts, are sold to metal-recycling companies.
TEXT.Italian: Un deposito di rottami è un'impresa commerciale in cui i veicoli smantellati, naufragati o dismessi sono portati; le loro parti utilizzabili vengono vendute per essere utilizzate nei veicoli operativi, mentre le parti metalliche inutilizzabili vengono vendute ad aziende che riutilizzano metalli riciclati.
TEXT.Polish: Złomowanie - uznawanie za nienadające się do dalszego użytkowania środków technicznych zużytych lub uszkodzonych, sklasyfikowanych jako nie nadające się do naprawy lub remontu, ale także przestarzałych technicznie lub zbędnych.

TEXT.English: Garbage Spaceport
TEXT.French: Spaceport Orbital de gestion des Ordures
TEXT.Italian: Spazioporto per la gestione dei rifiuti
TEXT.Polish: Port Kosmiczny Wywozu Odpadków

TEXT.English: Build a Garbage Spaceport to increase your cities health.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Spaceport Orbital de gestion des Ordures[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la santé de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci uno spazioporto per la gestione dei rifiuti per incrementare la salute della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Garbage Spaceport by poprawić jakość zdrowia Twoich poddanych w miastach.

TEXT.English: Send your garbage into space.
TEXT.Italian: Manda i tuoi rifiuti nello spazio.
TEXT.Polish: Odpady klasyfikuje się w zależności od źródeł powstawania, stopnia uciążliwości bądź stwarzania zagrożeń dla życia lub zdrowia ludzi oraz dla środowiska. W problematyce dotyczącej ochrony środowiska rozpatruje się i klasyfikuje odpady, jako substancje pochodzące zprodukcji lub konsumpcji, które zanieczyszczają środowisko.

TEXT.English: Waste Exportation Office
TEXT.Italian: Agenzia per l'esportazione dei rifiuti
TEXT.Polish: Biuro Exportu Odpadów

TEXT.English: Build a Waste Exportation Office to increase your cities health.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bureau d'Exportation des déchets[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la santé de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un'agenzia per l'esportazione dei rifiuti per incrementare la salute della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Waste Exportation Office by poprawić jakość zdrowia Twoich poddanych w miastach.

TEXT.English: Send your garbage to another country.
TEXT.Italian: Manda i tuoi rifiuti in un altro paese.
TEXT.Polish: Biuro zajmujące się eksportem odpadków do innych krajów.

TEXT.English: Street Cleaner
TEXT.Italian: Netturbini
TEXT.Polish: Zamiatacz Ulic

TEXT.English: Build a Street Cleaner to increase your cities health.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Service de Nettoyage urbain[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la santé de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci i netturbini per incrementare la salute della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Street Cleaner by poprawić jakość zdrowia Twoich poddanych w miastach.

TEXT.English: A street sweeper or street cleaner can refer to a person's occupation or a machine that cleans streets, usually in an urban area.
TEXT.Italian: Un netturbino è sia la persona che si occupa della pulizia delle strade, sia la macchina che svolge questo compito, solitamente in un'area urbana.
TEXT.Polish: Grupa ludzi odpowiedzialna za utrzymywanie czystości ulic miejskich.

TEXT.English: CO2 Reservoir
TEXT.French: Réservoir de CO2
TEXT.Italian: Filtri per CO2
TEXT.Polish: Rezerwuar CO2

TEXT.English: Build a CO2 Reservoir to decrease your cities air pollution.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Réservoir de CO2[COLOR_REVERT] pour diminuer la pollution de l'air de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci i filtri per CO2 per diminuire l'inquinamento atmosferico della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj CO2 Reservoir by zmniejszyć zanieczyszczenie.

TEXT.English: A CO2 Reservoir is used to store C02 emissions in a contained space rather than letting it go into the atmosphere.
TEXT.French: A Réservoir de CO2 is used to store C02 emissions in a contained space rather than letting it go into the atmosphere.
TEXT.Italian: I filtri per l'anidride carbonica servono a contenere le emissioni di CO2, piuttosto che lasciarla uscire nell'atmosfera.
TEXT.Polish: Zbironik do magazynowania CO2.

TEXT.English: Deacidification Station
TEXT.French: Station de Déacidification
TEXT.Italian: Stazione di deacidificazione
TEXT.Polish: Stacja Odkwaszania

TEXT.English: Build a Deacidification Station to counter the effects of Acid Rain.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Station de Déacidification[COLOR_REVERT] pour contrer les effets des pluies acides.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un compattatore di rifiuti per contrastare gli effetti delle piogge acide.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Deacidification Station to counter the effects of Acid Rain.

TEXT.English: A Deacidification Station counters the effects of Acid Rain by launching a flying drones, which will spray acid neutralizing liquid.
TEXT.French: A Station de Déacidification counters the effects of Acid Rain by launching a flying drones, which will spray acid neutralizing liquid.
TEXT.Italian: Una stazione di deacidificazione serve a combattere gli effetti delle piogge acide; è dotata di droni volanti che "innaffiano" le nuvole con speciali liquidi deacidificanti.

TEXT.English: Ozone Generator
TEXT.French: Générateur d'Ozone
TEXT.Italian: Generatore di ozono
TEXT.Polish: Generator Ozonu

TEXT.English: Build an Ozone Generator to decrease your cities air pollution.
TEXT.French: Construisez des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Générateurs d'Ozone[COLOR_REVERT] pour diminuer la pollution de l'air de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un generatore di ozono per diminuire l'inquinamento atmosferico della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Ozone Generator by zmniejszyć zanieczyszczenie.

TEXT.English: An Ozone Generator send out ozone filled nanobots high into atmosphere to repair the ozone layer directly.
TEXT.French: An Générateur d'Ozone send out ozone filled nanobots high into atmosphere to repair the ozone layer directly.
TEXT.Italian: Un generatore di ozono manda alcuni nanobot riempiti di ozono negli strati superiori dell'atmosfera, in modo da riparare direttamente lo strato d'ozono.
TEXT.Polish: Ozon jest jednym z najskuteczniejszych znanych środków dezynfekcyjnych. Nie jest on jednak pozbawiony wad. Jako uboczne produkty ozonowania powstają aldehydy iozonki. Ponadto wadą ozonu jest jego nietrwałość, a co za tym idzie, ryzyko wtórnego skażenia uprzednio zdezynfekowanej wody. Stąd konieczność dodatkowego chlorowania wody.

TEXT.English: River Sewage Treatment Plant
TEXT.French: Usine de traitement des Rivières
TEXT.Italian: Depuratore delle acque fognarie
TEXT.Polish: Rzeczna Oczyszczalnia Ścieków

TEXT.English: Build a River Sewage Treatment Plant to decrease your cities water pollution.
TEXT.French: Construisez une [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Usine de traitement des Rivières[COLOR_REVERT] pour diminuer la pollution de l'eau de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un depuratore delle acque fognarie per diminuire l'inquinamento dell'acqua della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj River Sewage Treatment Plant by zmniejszyć zanieczyszczenie.

TEXT.English: A River Sewage Treatment Plant is used to clean polluted rivers and return them to a natural state.
TEXT.French: A Usine de traitement des Rivières is used to clean polluted rivers and return them to a natural state.
TEXT.Italian: Un depuratore viene usato per pulire le acque fognarie prima di riversarle nei fiumi, in modo da ridurre l'apporto di materiali inquinanti.
TEXT.Polish: Oczyszczalnia ścieków - jest to zespół urządzeń i obiektów technologicznych służących do oczyszczania ścieków przemysłowych i komunalnych czyli do usuwania ze ścieków substancji w nich rozpuszczonych, koloidów izawiesin przed odprowadzeniem ich do rzeki, jeziora, morza, gruntu.

TEXT.English: Waste Compactor
TEXT.French: Compacteur de déchets
TEXT.Italian: Compattatore di rifiuti
TEXT.Polish: Ubijak Odpadów

TEXT.English: Build a Waste Compactor to increase your cities health.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Compacteur de déchets[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la santé de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un compattatore di rifiuti per incrementare la ricchezza della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Waste Compactor by poprawić jakość zdrowia Twoich poddanych w miastach.

TEXT.English: A compactor is a machine or mechanism used to reduce the size of waste material or soil through compaction. A trash compactor is often used by homes and businesses to reduce the volume of trash.
TEXT.Italian: Un compattatore è un macchinario utilizzato per ridurre le dimensioni del materiale di scarto, attraverso la compattazione. I compattatori di rifiuti vengono spesso usati nelle abitazioni e negli uffici per ridurre il volume dei rifiuti.
TEXT.Polish: To urządzenie służy kompaktowaniu domowych śmieci.

TEXT.English: Power (Gorge)
TEXT.French: Electricité (Hydro)
TEXT.Italian: Energia (Diga delle tre gole)
TEXT.Polish: Energia (Hydroenergia)

TEXT.English: A Building Produced Good.
TEXT.Italian: Questo edificio viene costruito automaticamente se costruisci la Diga delle tre gole in una città dello stesso continente.
TEXT.Polish: Budynek produkujący Dobra lub Surowce.

TEXT.English: The Three Gorges Dam is a hydroelectric dam that spans the Yangtze River by the town of Sandouping, located in the Yiling District of Yichang, in Hubei province, China.
TEXT.Italian: La Diga delle tre gole è uno sbarramento idroelettrico sul fiume Yangtze, vicino alla città di Sandouping, situata nel distretto Yiling di Yichang, nella provincia di Hubei (Cina).
TEXT.Polish: Elektrownia wodna - zakład przemysłowy zamieniający energię potencjalną wody na elektryczną. Elektrownie wodne są najintensywniej wykorzystywanym źródłem odnawialnej energii. W 2014 roku dostarczyły łącznie 3884 TWh energii elektrycznej, co stanowi 16,5% całkowitej produkcji energii elektrycznej na świecie. Największe elektrownie wodne mają moc, która przekracza 10 GW. Norwegia, Demokratyczna Republika Konga, Paragwaj i Brazylia uzyskują ponad 85% swojej energii elektrycznej z elektrowni wodnych. W Polsce w 2014 roku energetyka wodna odpowiadała za 1,4% produkcji energii elektrycznej.

TEXT.English: Power (Fusion)
TEXT.French: Electricité (Fusion)
TEXT.Italian: Energia (Fusione)
TEXT.Polish: Energia (Fuzja)

TEXT.English: A Building Produced Good.
TEXT.Italian: Questo edificio viene costruito automaticamente se costruisci la Centrale a fusione in una città dello stesso continente.
TEXT.Polish: Budynek produkujący Dobra lub Surowce.

TEXT.English: Nuclear fusion is the process by which two or more atomic nuclei join together, or "fuse", to form a single heavier nucleus. This is usually accompanied by the release or absorption of large quantities of energy. Fusion is the process that powers active stars, the hydrogen bomb and experimental devices examining fusion power for electrical generation.
TEXT.Italian: La fusione nucleare è un processo in cui due o più nuclei atomici si uniscono, o meglio si fondono, per formare un singolo nucleo più pesante. Questo processo viene spesso accompagnato dal rilascio o dall'assorbimento di grandi quantitativi di energia. La fusione è il processo alla base delle stelle, delle bombe ad idrogeno e dei dispositivi sperimentali a fusione per la generazione di elettricità.
TEXT.Polish: Zimna fuzja (ang. cold fusion) - nazwa hipotetycznej metody fuzji jąder atomowych, którą dałoby się przeprowadzić w temperaturze znacznie niższej niż dla znanych obecnie reakcji termojądrowych. Fuzja dwóch dowolnych jąder atomowych zachodzi, gdy mają one energię wystarczającą do pokonania odpychania elektrostatycznego protonów między jądrami i przybliżenia na odległość, w której krótkozasięgowe silne oddziaływania jądrowe przeważą odpychanie.

TEXT.English: Safety (Police Academy)
TEXT.French: Sécurité (Académie de Police)
TEXT.Italian: Sicurezza (Accademia di polizia)
TEXT.Polish: Bezpieczeństwo (Akademia Policyjna)

TEXT.English: A Building Produced Good.
TEXT.Italian: Questo bene viene prodotto da un edificio.
TEXT.Polish: Budynek produkujący Dobra lub Surowce.

TEXT.English: A police academy is a training school for new police recruits, also known as a law enforcement academy.
TEXT.Italian: Un'accademia di polizia è una scuola di addestramento per le nuove reclute della polizia.
TEXT.Polish: Bezpieczeństwo (Akademia Policyjna)

TEXT.English: Safety (Neighborhood Watch)
TEXT.French: Sécurité (Surveillance communautaire)
TEXT.Italian: Sicurezza (Sorveglianza comunitaria)
TEXT.Polish: Bezpieczeństwo (Straż Sąsiedzka)

TEXT.English: A Building Produced Good.
TEXT.Italian: Questo bene viene prodotto da un edificio.
TEXT.Polish: Budynek produkujący Dobra lub Surowce.

TEXT.English: Neighborhood watches are not vigilante organizations. When suspecting criminal activities, members are encouraged to contact authorities and not to intervene.
TEXT.Italian: La sorveglianza comunitaria non coincide con i vigilantes; quando sospettano di qualche attività criminale, i membri vengono incoraggiati a contattare le autorità e a non intervenire.

TEXT.English: Safety (Youth Curfew)
TEXT.French: Sécurité (Couvre-Feu)
TEXT.Italian: Sicurezza (Coprifuoco)
TEXT.Polish: Bezpieczeństwo (Godzina Policyjna Dla Młodych)

TEXT.English: A Building Produced Good.
TEXT.Italian: Questo bene viene prodotto da un edificio.
TEXT.Polish: Budynek produkujący Dobra lub Surowce.

TEXT.English: A curfew is an order specifying a time after which certain regulations apply.
TEXT.Italian: Un coprifuoco è un ordine secondo il quale vengono applicate alcune restrizioni dopo un certo orario.
TEXT.Polish: Godzina policyjna - ograniczenie poruszania się w określonych godzinach (najczęściej obowiązuje od 22 wieczorem do 6 rano). Wprowadzana jest przez władze w związku z niebezpieczną sytuacją np. zamieszkami, katastrofą naturalną czy zagrożeniem bezpieczeństwa państwa.

TEXT.English: Safety (Maximum Security Prison)
TEXT.French: Sécurité (Prison de Haute sécurité)
TEXT.Italian: Sicurezza (Prigione di massima sicurezza)
TEXT.Polish: Bezpieczeństwo (Więzienie pod maksymalnym nadzorem)

TEXT.English: A Building Produced Good.
TEXT.Italian: Questo bene viene prodotto da un edificio.
TEXT.Polish: Budynek produkujący Dobra lub Surowce.

TEXT.English: A Maximum Security Prison is the name used to describe "control-unit" prisons, or units within prisons, which represent the most secure levels of custody in some countries' prison systems. The objective is to provide long term, segregated housing for inmates classified as the highest security risks in the prison system - the "worst of the worst" criminals and those who pose a threat to the national security of a nation.
TEXT.French: A une Prison de Haute Sécurité is the name used to describe "control-unit" prisons, or units within prisons, which represent the most secure levels of custody in some countries' prison systems. The objective is to provide long term, segregated housing for inmates classified as the highest security risks in the prison system - the "worst of the worst" criminals and those who pose a threat to the national security of a nation.
TEXT.Italian: Una prigione di massima sicurezza è una prigione con elevatissimi standard di sicurezza nella gestione dei prigionieri. L'obiettivo è fornire una sistemazione a lungo termine e isolata a persone ritenute fra le più pericolose tra i detenuti: i criminali peggiori e coloro che sono un pericolo per la sicurezza nazionale.
TEXT.Polish: Bezpieczeństwo (Więzienie pod maksymalnym nadzorem)

TEXT.English: Build a Guild to give a gold bonus to its related building in every city.
TEXT.French: Une guilde permet d'obtenir un bonus d'or et des bâtiments spécifique dans chaque ville.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Guild to give a gold bonus to its related building in every city.

TEXT.English: A guild is an association of craftsmen in a particular trade. The earliest types of guild were formed as confraternities of workers. They were organized in a manner something between a trade union, a cartel, and a secret society. They often depended on grants of letters patent by a monarch or other authority to enforce the flow of trade to their self-employed members, and to retain ownership of tools and the supply of materials. A lasting legacy of traditional guilds are the guildhalls constructed and used as meeting places.
TEXT.Italian: Una gilda è un'associazione di artigiani in un particolare sistema economico. Le prime gilde nacquero come confraternite di lavoratori; avevano caratteristiche tipiche di un sindacato, di un cartello e di una società segreta. Dipendevano in gran parte da autorizzazioni, che venivano fornite da un monarca o un'altra autorità, per fornire ai loro membri delle agevolazioni nel commercio, oltre a permettergli la proprietà deggli arnesi e la fornitura di materiali. L'eredità delle gilde tradizionali sono le sale delle gilde, ustae come sale di ritrovo.
TEXT.Polish: Gildia (niem. Gilde - związek); także konfraternia (z łac. współbractwo) w średniowiecznej Europie stowarzyszenie o charakterze obronnym, religijnym lub towarzyskim.

TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Rehabilitation Center by poprawić jakość zdrowia Twoich poddanych w miastach.

TEXT.English: Build a Laser Eye Surgery Clinic to increase your cities happiness.
TEXT.French: Construisez une [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Clinique d'opérations au Laser[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter le bonheur votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci una clinica per la chirurgia laser per incrementare la felicità dalla tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Laser Eye Surgery Clinic by zwiększyć zadowolenie w Twoich miastach.

TEXT.English: Build a Plastic Surgery Clinic to increase your cities happiness.
TEXT.French: Construisez une [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Clinique de Chirurgie Plastique[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter le bonheur votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci una clinica per la chirurgia plastica per incrementare la felicità della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Plastic Surgery Clinic by zwiększyć zadowolenie w Twoich miastach.

TEXT.English: Optometry is a health care profession concerned with eyes and related structures, as well as vision, visual systems, and vision information processing in humans.
TEXT.Polish: Optometria (gr. optos - widziany i metreo - mierzenie) - dziedzina wiedzy stosowanej, zajmujaca sie procesem widzenia, a szczególnie ochrona, usprawnieniem, zachowaniem i rozwojem tego procesu.

TEXT.English: A field hospital is a large mobile medical unit that temporarily takes care of casualties on-site before they can be safely transported to more permanent hospital facilities.
TEXT.Polish: Szpital polowy - rodzaj tymczasowego szpitala, rozstawianego (w terminologii wojskowej: "rozwijanego") poza budynkami szpitala stalego, zazwyczaj przeznaczonego do leczenia ofiar dzialan wojennych, wielkich katastrof i klesk zywiolowych.

TEXT.English: Dentistry is that branch of medicine which deals with the study and practice of diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of diseases of the mouth, the maxilla, and the face.
TEXT.Polish: Lekarz dentysta (stomatolog), pot. dentysta - osoba uprawniona do praktycznego stosowania wiedzy z zakresustomatologii.

TEXT.English: Mental hospitals, are hospitals specializing in the treatment of serious mental disorder.
TEXT.Polish: Szpital psychiatryczny - miejsce terapii psychiatrycznej chorych. Szpitale psychiatryczne dziela sie otwarte i zamkniete specjalizujace sie w leczeniu chorób lub uzaleznien. Podobna funkcje pelni oddzial psychiatryczny bedacy oddzialem szpitala ogólnego.

TEXT.English: A retirement home is a multi-residence housing facility intended for old people.
TEXT.Polish: Dom opieki nad osobami w podeszlym wieku.

TEXT.English: A veterinarian, is a physician for animals (excluding humans) and a practitioner of veterinary medicine.
TEXT.Polish: Lekarz weterynarii (pot. weterynarz, staropol. konowal) - przedstawiciel jednej z trzech nauk lekarskich (obok medycyny i stomatologii) - osoba, która ukonczyla 5,5-letnie studia na jednym z wydzialów medycyny weterynaryjnej i uzyskala prawo do wykonywania zawodu nadawane przez okregowa izbe lekarsko-weterynaryjna, posiadajaca kwalifikacje do badania i leczenia zwierzat oraz do kontroli srodków spozywczychpochodzenia zwierzecego.

TEXT.English: Drug rehabilitation (often drug rehab or just rehab) is an umbrella term for the processes of medical and/or psychotherapeutic treatment, for dependency on psychoactive substances such as alcohol, prescription drugs, and so-called street drugs such as cocaine, heroin or amphetamines.
TEXT.Polish: Rehabilitacja medyczna - kompleksowe i zespolowe dzialanie na rzecz osoby niepelnosprawnej fizycznie lub psychicznie (lub z deficytem w ww. obszarach), które ma na celu przywrócenie tej osobie pelnej lub maksymalnej do osiagniecia sprawnosci fizycznej lub psychicznej, a takze zdolnosci do pracy oraz do brania czynnego udzialu w zyciu spolecznym. Rehabilitacja jest integralna czescia procesu terapeutycznego, na równi z innymi metodami leczenia, wspóldecydujaca o jego ostatecznej efektywnosci. Ze wzgledu na zróznicowanie oddzialywan rehabilitacja (szczególnie rehabilitacja neurologiczna - neurorehabilitacja) jest czesto prowadzona przez interdyscyplinarny zespól terapeutyczny skladajacy sie z lekarzy róznych specjalnosci, fizjoterapeutów, terapeutów zajeciowych, pielegniarek, logopedów, psychologów, muzykoterapeutów itp.

TEXT.English: Lasik is a type of refractive surgery for correcting myopia, hyperopia, and astigmatism.
TEXT.Polish: Laser-Assisted in situ Keratomileusis (LASIK) - typ refrakcyjnej operacji laserowej oczu przeprowadzanej przez okulistów dla korekcji krótkowzrocznosci, dalekowzrocznosci i astygmatyzmu. W odróznieniu od metodyfotokeratektomii refrakcyjnej, PRK (zwana tez ASA, Advanced Surface Ablation) nie jest wymagane usuniecienablonka, dzieki czemu oczy szybciej sie goja, a pacjent nie czuje bólu. Mozna tez ta metoda leczyc obydwoje oczu jednoczesnie. Wystepuja jednak przypadki, w których wskazane jest przeprowadzenie operacji metoda PRK/ASA. Wielu pacjentów wybiera metode LASIK alternatywnie do noszenia korekcyjnych okularów albo szkiel kontaktowych.

TEXT.English: Plastic surgery is a medical specialty concerned with the correction or restoration of form and function.
TEXT.Polish: Chirurgia plastyczna (kosmetyczna lub estetyczna) - dziedzinamedycyny zajmujaca sie korekta rzeczywistych lub odczuwanych defektów ciala. Zwiazana scisle z chirurgia dziecieca, neurochirurgia,laryngologia, okulistyka, traumatologia, ortopedia oraz równie waznymi jak fizjologia, patologia, immunologia, rehabilitacja, psychologia,psychiatria.

TEXT.English: Acupuncturist's Shop
TEXT.German: Akupunkteurladen
TEXT.Italian: Negozio dell'agopuntore
TEXT.Polish: Gabinety Akupunktury

TEXT.English: Build an Acupuncturist's Shop to increase your cities health.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Acuponcteur[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la santé de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un negozio dell'agopuntore per incrementare la salute della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Acupuncturist's Shop by poprawić jakość zdrowia Twoich poddanych w miastach.

TEXT.English: Acupuncture is the procedure of inserting and manipulating filiform needles into various points on the body to relieve pain or for therapeutic purposes.
TEXT.Polish: Akupunktura (z lac. acus - igla, punctura - (u)klucie) - technika leczenia wywodzaca sie ze Wschodu (Chiny, Japonia, Mongolia). Jest obecnie uznawana w wielu krajach jako uzupelnienie medycyny konwencjonalnej, chociaz jej skutecznosc jest przedmiotem debat i trwajacych badan klinicznych. Akupunktura sluzy do przywracania równowagi energii qi organizmu, bedacej warunkiem jego sprawnego funkcjonowania co w efekcie ma dawac poprawe u pacjenta objawowa taka jak np. redukcja bólu.

TEXT.English: Barber Shop
TEXT.German: Barbier
TEXT.Italian: Barbiere
TEXT.Polish: Salon Fryzjerski

TEXT.English: Barber Shops are a good way to "clean up" the male population in your city.
TEXT.French: Faire s'installer un Barbier est un bon moyen pour se faire de l'argent, et d'améliorer la santé et la culture de la population masculine de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: I barbieri sono un ottimo modo per "ripulire" la popolazione maschile della tua città.

TEXT.English: The barber's trade is an ancient one. Razors have been found among relics of the Bronze Age (circa 3500 BC) in Egypt.[NEWLINE]Shaving, either of the head or face, was not always a voluntary act, for it has been enforced by law in England and elsewhere. Cleanliness and vanity were therefore not the sole reasons for a "clean shave"; the origins lie deeper.[NEWLINE]Before the Macedonian conquest brought the custom of clean shaving, the Greek agora would trim and style his patrons' beards, hair, and fingernails, as gossip and debate flowed freely.[NEWLINE]Barbering was introduced to Rome by the Greek colonies in Sicily in 296 B.C., and barber shops quickly became very popular centres for daily news and gossip. A morning visit to the tonsor became a part of the daily routine, as important as the visit to the public baths, and a young man's first shave (tonsura) was an essential part of his coming of age ceremony.
TEXT.Polish: Fryzjer - rzemieslnik zajmujacy sie zgodnie z zyczeniami klientów strzyzeniem wlosów, ich pielegnacja, ukladaniem, farbowaniem, myciem. Zawód fryzjera nalezy do grupy zawodów uslugowych. Dzieki posiadanym umiejetnosciom fryzjer moze równiez prowadzic wlasny zaklad uslugowy.

TEXT.English: Ancient Embalmer
TEXT.Italian: Imbalsamatore antico
TEXT.Polish: Starożytny Balsamista

TEXT.English: Build an Ancient Embalmer to increase your cities health and culture.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Embaumeur Antique[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la santé, la richesse et la culture.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un imbalsamatore antico per incrementare la salute e la cultura della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Ancient Embalmer to increase your cities health and culture.

TEXT.English: A mummy is a corpse whose skin and organs have been preserved by either intentional or incidental exposure to chemicals, extreme coldness (ice mummies), very low humidity, or lack of air when bodies are submerged in bogs. Presently, the oldest discovered (naturally) mummified human corpse is a decapitated head dated as 6,000 years old, found in 1936.
TEXT.Polish: Mumifikacja, (lac. mumificatio) - proces konserwacji zwlok zapobiegajacy rozkladowi. Naturalnie do utrwalenia zwlok dochodzi w srodowisku suchym i przewiewnym, przy wzglednie wysokiej temperaturze powietrza, które pozwala na szybka utrate wody z powlok skórnych i narzadów wewnetrznych.

TEXT.English: Modern Embalmer
TEXT.Italian: Imbalsamatore moderno
TEXT.Polish: Współczesny Balsamista

TEXT.English: Build a Modern Embalmer to increase your cities health and culture.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Etablissement de Pompes funèbres[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la santé, la richesse et la culture.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un imbalsamatore moderno per incrementare la salute e la cultura della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Modern Embalmer to increase your cities health and culture.

TEXT.English: Embalming, in most modern cultures, is the art and science of temporarily preserving human remains to forestall decomposition and to make them suitable for public display at a funeral. The three goals of embalming are thus sanitization, presentation and preservation (or restoration) of a corpse to achieve this effect. Embalming has a very long and cross-cultural history, with many cultures giving the embalming processes a greater religious meaning.
TEXT.Polish: Zaraz po smierci Egipcjanina rozpoczynala sie zaloba. Mezczyzni nie golili sie, a kobiety smarowaly twarz blotem. Bogate rodziny oplacaly placzki, które z krzykiem i glosnym lamentowaniem biegaly przez ulice i oglaszaly te nowine. Zwloki ubogich ludzi byly owijane w trzcinowe maty i grzebane w piasku. Natomiast faraonowie i wysocy urzednicy mieli bardzo bogaty pogrzeb.

TEXT.English: Healing Clay
TEXT.Italian: Argilla curativa
TEXT.Polish: Lecznicza Glinka

TEXT.English: Build a Healing Clay to increase your cities health.
TEXT.French: Construisez une [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fosse d'Argile médecinal[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la santé de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Raccogli l'argilla curativa per incrementare la salute della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Healing Clay by poprawić jakość zdrowia Twoich poddanych w miastach.

TEXT.English: The use of medicinal clay in folk medicine goes back to prehistoric times. Indigenous peoples around the world still use clay widely, which is related to geophagy. The first recorded use of medicinal clay goes back to ancient Mesopotamia. A wide variety of clays is being used for medicinal purposes primarily for external applications, such as the clay baths in health spas (mud therapy), but also internally. Among the clays most commonly used for medicinal purposes are kaolin and the smectite clays such as bentonite, montmorillonite, and Fuller's earth.
TEXT.Polish: Dól w którym znajduje sie zapas leczniczej gliny.

TEXT.English: Mud Bath
TEXT.Italian: Bagno di fango
TEXT.Polish: Błotna łaźnia

TEXT.English: Build a Mud Bath to increase your cities health.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bain de boue[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la santé de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un bagno di fango per incrementare la salute della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Mud Bath by poprawić jakość zdrowia Twoich poddanych w miastach.

TEXT.English: A mud bath is a bath of mud, commonly from areas where hot spring water can combine with volcanic ash. Mud baths have existed for thousands of years, and can be found now in high-end spas in many countries of the world.
TEXT.Polish: Lazna w której goscie korzystaja z kapieli blotnych.

TEXT.English: Sweat Lodge
TEXT.Italian: Capanna per il sudore
TEXT.Polish: Sauna

TEXT.English: Build a Sweat Lodge to increase your cities health.
TEXT.French: Construisez une [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hutte à sudation[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la santé de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci una capanna per il sudore per incrementare la salute della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Sweat Lodge by poprawić jakość zdrowia Twoich poddanych w miastach.

TEXT.English: The sweat lodge is a ceremonial sauna and is an important event in some North American First Nations or Native American cultures. There are several styles of sweat lodges that include a domed or oblong hut similar to a wickiup, or even a simple hole dug into the ground and covered with planks or tree trunks. Stones are typically heated in an exterior fire and then placed in a central pit in the ground.
TEXT.Polish: Sauna - pomieszczenie, w którym panuje wysoka temperatura i wysoka lub niska wilgotnosc (w zaleznosci od rodzaju sauny), w którym spedza sie od kilku do kilkunastu minut. Pobyt w saunie ma wlasciwosci poprawiajace krazenie. Po pobycie w saunie bierze sie zwykle kapiel w chlodnej wodzie. Sauna najpopularniejsza jest w Finlandii, Estonii, Lotwie, Litwie, a takze w Rosji, odgrywa w tych krajach wazna role spoleczna. Sauny byly budowane przez Slowian i ludy finskie (przodków m.in. dzisiejszych Finów i Estonczyków) od niepamietnych czasów.

TEXT.English: Soap Maker
TEXT.Italian: Produttore di sapone
TEXT.Polish: Mydlarz

TEXT.English: Build a Soap Maker to increase your cities health.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Savonnier[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la santé de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un produttore di sapone per incrementare la salute della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Soap Maker by poprawić jakość zdrowia Twoich poddanych w miastach.

TEXT.English: In chemistry, soap is a salt of a fatty acid. Soaps are mainly used as surfactants for washing, bathing, and cleaning, but they are also used in textile spinning and are important components of lubricants. Soaps for cleansing are obtained by treating vegetable or animal oils and fats with a strongly alkaline solution.
TEXT.Polish: Mydla znane sa od starozytnosci i sluza od tego czasu jako srodki myjace i piorace. Mydlo zostalo wynalezione przez Fenicjan. Myjacy efekt mydel wynika z ich wlasnosci amfifilowych. W wodzie tworza one subtelna emulsje.Micele czasteczek mydla obecne w wodzie przy zetknieciu z nierozpuszczalnym w wodzie brudem (glównie tluszczami) wnikaja w jego strukture i "rozpuszczaja go" poprzez wciagniecie czasteczek tluszczu do wnetrza swoich miceli.

TEXT.English: Factory (Soap)
TEXT.Italian: Fabbrica di sapone
TEXT.Polish: Fabryka Mydła

TEXT.English: Build a Soap Factory to increase your cities health.
TEXT.French: Construisez une [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Usine de Savons[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la santé de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci una fabbrica di sapone per incrementare la salute della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Soap Factory by poprawić jakość zdrowia Twoich poddanych w miastach.

TEXT.English: In chemistry, soap is a salt of a fatty acid. Soaps are mainly used as surfactants for washing, bathing, and cleaning, but they are also used in textile spinning and are important components of lubricants. Soaps for cleansing are obtained by treating vegetable or animal oils and fats with a strongly alkaline solution.

TEXT.English: Orphanage
TEXT.Italian: Orfanotrofio
TEXT.Polish: Sierociniec

TEXT.English: Build an Orphanage to increase your cities health.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orphelinat[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la santé de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un orfanotrofio per incrementare la salute della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Orphanage by poprawić jakość zdrowia Twoich poddanych w miastach.

TEXT.English: An orphanage is defined as "An Institution that houses children whose parents are deceased or whose whereabouts are unknown." It is a public institution created to provide care for protection for children without parents.
TEXT.Polish: Do domów dziecka kierowane sa dzieci i mlodziez, których potrzeby stale lub okresowo nie moga byc zaspokajane w domu rodzinnym. Oznacza to, ze domy dziecka sa powolane do istnienia nie tylko dla sierot, ale takze dla dzieci i mlodziezy zaniedbanych srodowiskowo, których rodzina nie wywiazuje sie z powierzonych zadan. Takie dzieci i mlodziez nazywana jest wtedy sierotami spolecznymi. Wedlug badan GUS-u, w roku 1997 istnialo w Polsce 351 domów dziecka, w których przebywalo prawie 18 000 dzieci i mlodziezy. Tylko ok. 3% z tej liczby stanowily sieroty naturalne.

TEXT.English: Hostel
TEXT.Italian: Ostello

TEXT.English: Build a Hostel to increase your cities health.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hospice[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la santé de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un ostello per incrementare la salute della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Hostel by poprawić jakość zdrowia Twoich poddanych w miastach.

TEXT.English: Hostels provide budget oriented, sociable accommodation where guests can rent a bed, usually a bunk bed, in a dormitory and share a bathroom, lounge and sometimes a kitchen. Rooms can be mixed or single-sex, although private rooms may also be available. Hostels may include a hot meal in the price.
TEXT.French: un Hospices provide budget oriented, sociable accommodation where guests can rent a bed, usually a bunk bed, in a dormitory and share a bathroom, lounge and sometimes a kitchen. Rooms can be mixed or single-sex, although private rooms may also be available. un Hospices may include a hot meal in the price.
TEXT.Polish: Hostel - tanie miejsce tymczasowego zakwaterowania o standardzie rózniacym sie od hotelu glównie liczba miejsc w pokojach, lózkami pietrowymi i wspóldzieleniem czesci wyposazenia oraz pomieszczen przeznaczonych dla gosci (np. wspólna kuchnia i lazienka). Najczestszymi goscmi w hostelach sa studenci i osoby uczace sie z róznych krajów. Charakterystyczne dla hostelu jest wynajmowanie lózka, a nie pokoju. Pierwszy hostel (schronisko mlodziezowe) otwarty zostal przez Richarda Schirrmanna w Niemczech w roku 1912.

TEXT.English: Almshouse
TEXT.Italian: Ospizio
TEXT.Polish: Przytułek

TEXT.English: Build an Almshouse to increase your cities health.
TEXT.French: Construisez une [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Maison-Dieu[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la santé de votre ville.

TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Almshouse by poprawić jakość zdrowia Twoich poddanych w miastach.

TEXT.English: Almshouses are charitable housing provided to enable people (typically elderly people who can no longer work to earn enough to pay rent) to live in a particular community. They are often targeted at the poor of a locality, at those from certain forms of previous employment, or their widows, and are generally maintained by a charity or the trustees of a bequest.
TEXT.French: une Maison-Dieus are charitable housing provided to enable people (typically elderly people who can no longer work to earn enough to pay rent) to live in a particular community. They are often targeted at the poor of a locality, at those from certain forms of previous employment, or their widows, and are generally maintained by a charity or the trustees of a bequest.
TEXT.Polish: Schroniska dla bezdomnych przeznaczone sa dla osób, które nigdzie nie sa zameldowane, czesto nie posiadajadowodów tozsamosci i stalych zródel dochodu. Czesto podopieczni schronisk obciazeni sa nalogami (alkoholizm,narkomania). Spolecznosc schronisk w duzej mierze sklada sie z ludzi, którzy weszli w konflikt z prawem. Prowadzone sa przez organizacje pozarzadowe (zakony, fundacje, stowarzyszenia itp.). Na swoja dzialalnosc pozyskuja fundusze w wiekszosci od sponsorów, a w mniejszym stopniu i od wladz lokalnych na terenie, na którym funkcjonuja.

TEXT.English: Meal Center
TEXT.Italian: Mensa pubblica
TEXT.Polish: Jadłodajnia

TEXT.English: Build a Meal Center to increase your cities health.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Restau du coeur[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la santé de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci una mensa pubblica per incrementare la salute della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Meal Center by poprawić jakość zdrowia Twoich poddanych w miastach.

TEXT.English: A soup kitchen, a bread line, or a meal center is a place where food is offered to the hungry for free or at a reasonably low price. Frequently located in lower-income neighborhoods, they are often staffed by volunteer organizations, such as church groups or community groups. Soup kitchens sometimes obtain food from a food bank for free or at a low price, because they are considered a charity which makes it easier for them to feed the many people who visit the soup kitchen.
TEXT.Polish: Stolówka - miejsce spozywania posilków - jadlodajnia lub sala jadalna zakladu zywienia zbiorowego lub okreslenie dla zakladu zywienia zbiorowego.

TEXT.English: National Medical Database
TEXT.Italian: Database medico nazionale
TEXT.Polish: Narodowa Baza Medyczna

TEXT.English: Build a National Medical Database to increase your cities health.
TEXT.French: Construisez la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Base de données Médicale Nationale[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la santé de vos villes.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un database medico nazionale per incrementare la salute della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj National Medical Database by poprawić jakość zdrowia Twoich poddanych w miastach.

TEXT.English: The National Medical Database links all medical centers together, so they can share information with each other more efficiently.
TEXT.French: The une Base de données Médicale Nationale links all medical centers together so they can share information with each other more efficiently.
TEXT.Italian: Il Database medico nazionale collega tra di loro tutti i centri medici, in modo che possano scambiare informazioni in modo più efficiente.
TEXT.Polish: Medycyna (lac. medicina "sztuka lekarska") - nauka empiryczna (oparta na doswiadczeniu) obejmujaca calosc wiedzy o zdrowiu i chorobach czlowieka oraz sposobach ich zapobiegania, oraz ich leczenia. Medycyna weterynaryjna rozszerza zakres zainteresowan medycyny na stan zdrowia zwierzat. Za prekursora medycyny starozytnej uwaza sie Hipokratesa, a nowozytnej Paracelsusa. W czasach najnowszych wprowadza sie zasadymedycyny opartej na faktach.

TEXT.English: Child care or day care is the care of a child during the day by a person other than the child's legal guardians, typically performed by someone outside the child's immediate family. Day care is typically an ongoing service during specific periods, such as the parents' time at work.
TEXT.Polish: Zlobek - zaklad opiekunczo-wychowawczy dla dzieci w wieku od 6 tygodni do okolo trzech lat, których rodzice lub opiekunowie pracuja poza domem. Zlobek zapewnia dzieciom zywienie, zabiegi pielegnacyjno-zdrowotne, opieke wychowawcza oraz niekiedy zajecia edukacyjne (m.in. jezyki obce, basen, rytmika).

TEXT.English: A youth club or youth social club is a place where young people can meet and participate in activities such as football, soccer, basketball, table tennis, or video games, or religious activities.

TEXT.Italian: Costruisci delle case in erba per incrementare la ricchezza e la produzione della tua città.

TEXT.English: A hut is a small and crude shelter, usually used for dwelling. Its design favors local techniques and materials to allow for swift and inexpensive construction. First designed by the African tribes Hundreds of thousands of years ago.
TEXT.Italian: Una capanna è un riparo semplice e spartano, usato solitamente come abitazione. la sua costruzione predilige tecniche e materiali che permettono una costruzione veloce e poco costosa. Le prime capanne vennero costruite dalle prime tribù africane centinaia di migliaia di anni fa.
TEXT.Polish: Szałas - slowo pochodzenia woloskiego (por. rum. salas "mieszkanie, siedziba"), oznaczajace: Trwaly budynek z drewna lub kamienia, czasami bez okien. Przeznaczony na sezonowe miejsce zamieszkania - np. pasterzy w górach. Tymczasowe schronienie wykonane z galezi zwykle w ksztalcie stozka lub dwuspadowego daszka.

TEXT.English: Launch Arcology
TEXT.French: Lancer un projet d'arcologie
TEXT.Italian: Abitazioni (Arcologia da lancio)
TEXT.Polish: Start Arkologii

TEXT.English: Build a Launch Arcology to improve you city.
TEXT.French: Pour améliorer votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un'arcologia da lancio per migliorare la tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Launch Arcology to improve you city.

TEXT.English: The Launch Arcology is a city sized mobile arcology.
TEXT.French: The Lancer un projet d'arcologie is a city sized moble arcology.
TEXT.Italian: L'arcologia da lancio è un'arcologia, di dimensioni paragonabili a quelle di una città, che può essere anche spostata.
TEXT.Polish: Arkologia - struktura lub osiedle o niezwykle wysokiej gestosci zaludnienia, czesto osiagajaca wysokosc powyzej 1 kilometra. Termin zostal stworzony przez architekta Paolo Soleriego jako polaczenie "architektury" z "ekologia". Jak na razie konstrukcje te nie wyszly poza faze projektów i rozwazan teoretycznych oraz eksperymentów przeprowadzanych w Arcosanti w centralnej Arizonie (USA). Popularne w fantastyce naukowej, sa przedstawiane jako rozwiazanie problemów przeludnienia i degradacji srodowiska, poniewaz zmniejszaja zapotrzebowanie miast na teren i zasoby, chociaz cechuja sie wieksza niz normalna gestoscia zaludnienia oraz powazna modyfikacja okreslonego obszaru. Wiekszosc miast rozrasta sie jedynie w plaszczyznie poziomej, zajmujac coraz wieksze polacie ziemi, arkologie zas sa konstrukcjami nieco bardziej "trójwymiarowymi".

TEXT.English: Housing (Tipis)
TEXT.German: Tipis
TEXT.Italian: Abitazioni (Tipì)
TEXT.Polish: Domostwa (Tipi)

TEXT.English: Build Tipis to increase your cities wealth and production.
TEXT.French: Augmente la richesse et la production de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci i tipì per incrementare la ricchezza e la produzione della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Tipis by zwiększyć produkcję i bogactwo w Twoich miastach.

TEXT.English: A tipi is a Lakota name for a conical tent traditionally made of animal skins and wooden poles used by the nomadic tribes and sedentary tribal dwellers (when hunting) of the Great Plains.
TEXT.Italian: Un tipì è una tipica tenda Lakota di forma conica fatta tradizionalmente con pelli di animali e pali di legno; veniva usata dalle tribù nomadi delle Grandi Pianure americane.
TEXT.Polish: Tipi - rodzaj namiotu Indian Ameryki Pólnocnej, glównie pólnocnej czesci obszaru Wielkich Równin. Nazwa pochodzi z jezyka siou i oznacza "miejsce gdzie sie zyje". Uzywane byly do mieszkania przez koczownicze plemiona, utrzymujace sie z polowania na bizony (m.in. Dakotowie).

TEXT.English: Housing (Yurts)
TEXT.German: Yurts
TEXT.Italian: Abitazioni (Yurte)
TEXT.Polish: Domostwa (Jurty)

TEXT.English: Build Yurts to increase your cities wealth and production.
TEXT.French: Augmente la richesse et la production de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci le yurte per incrementare la ricchezza e la produzione della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Yurts by zwiększyć produkcję i bogactwo w Twoich miastach.

TEXT.English: A yurt is a portable, bent wood-framed dwelling structure traditionally used by Turkic nomads in the steppes of Central Asia.
TEXT.Italian: Una yurta è una struttura abitativa con telaio in legno portatile e piegabile, tradizionalmente usata dai turchi nomadi nelle steppe dell'Asia centrale.
TEXT.Polish: Jurta - najpopularniejsza nazwa dla namiotu koczowników Wielkiego Stepu. W rzeczywistosci slowo to pochodzi z jezyków tureckich, wiec dotyczy jedynie tych, które mozna zobaczyc od Morza Kaspijskiego po Altaj. Na stepach Mongolii, od Altaju Zachodniego poWielki Chingan, namioty te nazywaja sie ger.

TEXT.English: Housing (Hogans)
TEXT.German: Hogans
TEXT.Italian: Abitazioni (Case di terra)
TEXT.Polish: Domostwa (Hogans)

TEXT.English: Build Hogans to increase your cities wealth and production.
TEXT.French: Augmente la richesse et la production de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci le case di terra per incrementare la ricchezza e la produzione della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Hogans by zwiększyć produkcję i bogactwo w Twoich miastach.

TEXT.English: A hogan is the primary traditional home of the Navajo people. Other traditional structures include the summer shelter, the underground home, and the sweat house. A hogan is usually round and cone shaped, but they may also be square, with the door facing east to welcome the rising sun, or for good wealth and fortune. Made of wood and packed mud and earth.
TEXT.Italian: Una casa di terra è la casa principale e tradizionale del popolo Navajo. Altre strutture tradizionali sono il rifugio d'estate, la casa sotterranea e la casa per il sudore. Una casa in terra di solito è rotonda e a forma di cono, ma può anche essere quadrata, con la porta rivolta a est per accogliere il sole che sorge, o per la buona ricchezza e fortuna. Viene realizzata con legno, fango e terra.
TEXT.Polish: Hogan (w języku Nawahów hooghan) - rodzaj stalego schronienia, z jednym pomieszczeniem w srodku. Budowany przez Indian, glównie z plemienia Nawahów, ale takze Apaczów. Oryginalnie budowany byl na planie okregu i w ksztalcie scietego stozka, obecnie zwykle na planie kwadratu, z otworem wejsciowym skierowanym na wschód. Sciany wykonywane sa z drewnianych klód i galezi, oblepionych glina.

TEXT.English: Housing (Treehouses)
TEXT.German: Treehouses
TEXT.Italian: Abitazioni (Capanne sugli alberi)
TEXT.Polish: Domostwa (Domki na drzewie)

TEXT.English: Build Treehouses to increase your cities wealth and production.
TEXT.French: Augmente la richesse et la production de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci le capanne sguli alberi per incrementare la ricchezza e la produzione della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Treehouses by zwiększyć produkcję i bogactwo w Twoich miastach.

TEXT.English: Treehouses are platforms or buildings constructed around, next to or among the trunk or branches of one or more mature trees while above ground level. Tree houses can be used for recreation, work space, habitation, observation or as temporary retreats.
TEXT.Italian: Le case sugli alberi sono piattaforme o edifici costruiti vicino o sopra ai rami o ai tronchi di uno o più alberi maturi, situati ad una certa distanza dal suolo. Le case sugli alberi vengono usate per divertimento, come spazi di lavoro, come abitazioni, come punti d'osservazione o come rifugi temporanei.
TEXT.Polish: Domek na drzewie lub dom na drzewie to platforma i/lub niewielki budynek zbudowany na galeziach, w jego wnetrzu lub wokól pnia. Uzywane w celach spolecznych (Lud Korowai lub Papuasi), rekreacyjnych, obserwacyjnych a takze jako miejsce pracy

TEXT.English: Kiva
TEXT.Italian: Abitazioni (Kiva)

TEXT.English: Build a Kiva to increase your cities happiness and culture.
TEXT.French: Augmente le bonheur et la culture de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci una Kiva to increase your cities happiness and culture.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Kiva by zwiększyć zadowolenie i kulturę w Twoich miastach.

TEXT.English: A kiva is a room used by modern Puebloans for religious rituals, many of them associated with the kachina belief system. Among the modern Hopi and most other Pueblo peoples, kivas are square-walled and underground, and are used for spiritual ceremonies.
TEXT.Italian: Una kiva è una stanza utilizzata dai moderni Pueblos per rituali religiosi, molti dei quali associati con il sistema di credenze Kachina. Tra i moderni Hopi e la maggior parte di altri popoli Pueblo, le kiva sono quadrate e sotterranee; vengono utilizzate per le cerimonie spirituali.
TEXT.Polish: Kiva - prostokątne lub okrągłe pomieszczenie, zazwyczaj wykonane z cegły adobe lub kamienia, czasem zaglebione czesciowo w ziemi, sluzacepólnocnoamerykanskim Indianom z plemion Hopi i Pueblo do celów obrzedowych. Takze rodzaj podobnych prekolumbijskich budowli, owalnych i czesciowo zaglebionych w ziemi, tworzonych na poludniowym zachodzie dzisiejszych Stanów Zjednoczonych przez przodków tamtejszych Indian, m.in. z kultury Anasazi, prawdopodobnie takze w celach religijnych.

TEXT.English: Housing (Lean-Tos)
TEXT.German: Lean-Tos
TEXT.Italian: Abitazioni (Tettoie)
TEXT.Polish: Domostwa (Przybudówki)

TEXT.English: Build Lean-Tos to increase your cities wealth and production.
TEXT.French: Augmente la richesse et la production de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci le tettoie per incrementare la ricchezza e la produzione della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Lean-Tos by zwiększyć produkcję i bogactwo w Twoich miastach.

TEXT.English: A lean-to is a term used to describe a roof with a single slope. The term also applies to a variety of structures that are built using a lean-to roof.
TEXT.Italian: Una tettoia è un tetto dotato di un unico spiovente. Il termine si riferisce anche a tutte le strutture che utilizzano un tetto a spiovente singolo.
TEXT.Polish: Przybudówka to budynek lub czesc budynku, zwykle mala i podrzedna, zbudowana przy stojacej wczesniej budowli

TEXT.English: Housing (Stilt Huts)
TEXT.German: Stilt Huts
TEXT.Italian: Abitazioni (Palafitte)
TEXT.Polish: Domostwa (Chaty na palach)

TEXT.English: Build Stilt Huts to increase your cities wealth and production.
TEXT.French: Augmente la richesse et la production de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci le palafitte per incrementare la ricchezza e la produzione della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Stilt Huts by zwiększyć produkcję i bogactwo w Twoich miastach.

TEXT.English: Stilt Huts are houses raised on piles over the surface of the soil or a body of water.
TEXT.Italian: Le palafitte sono case costruite sopra a pali piantati in un terreno umido o perfino acquatico, in modo che la casa non tocchi terra.
TEXT.Polish: Chaty na palach stawia sie na terenach podmoklych takich jak moczary, bagna oraz tereny zalewowe rzek i nad brzegiem morza - ze wzgledu na przyplyw.

TEXT.English: Housing (Pueblos)
TEXT.German: Pueblos
TEXT.Italian: Abitazioni (Pueblo)
TEXT.Polish: Domostwa (Pueblos)

TEXT.English: Build Pueblos to increase your cities wealth and production.
TEXT.French: Construisez des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pueblos[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la richesse et la production de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci i pueblo per incrementare la ricchezza e la produzione della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Pueblos by zwiększyć produkcję i bogactwo w Twoich miastach.

TEXT.English: The first Spanish explorers of the Southwest used this term to describe the communities housed in apartment-like structures built of stone, adobe mud, and other local material.
TEXT.Italian: I primi esploratori spagnoli del sudest usarono questo termine per descrivere le comunità che abitavano in strutture simili ad appartamenti scavate nella pietra e rifinite con fango e altri materiali locali.
TEXT.Polish: Nazwa pueblo okresla sie równiez wies badz osade charakterystyczna dla tych plemion. Zyja w osadach wtopionych w skalisto-pustynny krajobraz Nowego Meksyku. Tradycyjne domy buduja z kamienia, belek oraz niewypalanej prostokatnej cegly adobe zrobionej z suszonej na sloncu gliny zmieszanej ze sloma i plewami. Wznoszone sa tarasowo a na wyzsze pietra i na dachy, które sa plaskie, wchodzi sie po drabinach.

TEXT.English: Housing (Cliff Dwelling)
TEXT.German: Cliff Dwelling
TEXT.Italian: Abitazioni (Case nella roccia)
TEXT.Polish: Domostwa (Zamieszkanie klify)

TEXT.English: Build Cliff Dwelling to increase your cities wealth and production.
TEXT.French: Augmente la richesse et la production de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci le case nella roccia per incrementare la ricchezza e la produzione della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Cliff Dwelling by zwiększyć produkcję i bogactwo w Twoich miastach.

TEXT.English: Cliff dwelling is the general archaeological term for the habitations of prehistorical peoples, formed by using niches or caves in high cliffs, with more or less excavation or with additions in the way of masonry.
TEXT.Italian: Le case nella roccia erano usate da parte degli uomini preistorici, formate usando nicchie o grotte presenti in grandi falesie; venivano ampliate grazie a vari processi di scavo, o rifinite con lavori di muratura.
TEXT.Polish: Klif, faleza, urwisko brzegowe, brzeg wysoki - stroma, czesto pionowa sciana brzegu morskiego lub jeziornego, utworzona wskutek podmywania brzegu przez fale (procesu abrazji) zachodzacego u jej podstawy na styku zplatforma abrazyjna.

TEXT.English: Housing (Frat House)
TEXT.German: Frat House
TEXT.Italian: Abitazioni (Confraternita)
TEXT.Polish: Domostwa (Dom Studencki)

TEXT.English: Build Frat House to increase your cities wealth and production.
TEXT.French: Augmente la richesse et la production de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci una confraternita per incrementare la ricchezza e la produzione della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Frat House by zwiększyć produkcję i bogactwo w Twoich miastach.

TEXT.English: North American fraternity and sorority housing refers largely to the houses or housing areas that fraternity and sorority members live and work together in. In addition to serving as housing, fraternity and sorority housing may also serve to host social gatherings, meetings, and functions that benefit the community.
TEXT.Italian: Le abitazioni di confraternite e sorellanze del Nord America sono le case o le aree abitative dove i membri della confraternità e della sorellanza vivono e lavorano insieme. Oltre a servire come abitazioni, queste case servono anche per ospitare eventi sociali, riunioni e funzioni che beneficiano la comunità.
TEXT.Polish: Dom studencki (dom akademicki, pot. akademik) - obiekt mieszkalny dlastudentów w czasie studiów wyzszych, bedacy pod nadzorem uczelni.

TEXT.English: Housing (Trailer Park)
TEXT.German: Trailer Park
TEXT.Italian: Abitazioni (Terreno da campeggio)
TEXT.Polish: Domostwa (Przyczepy Kempingowe)

TEXT.English: Build Trailer Park to increase your cities wealth and production.
TEXT.French: Augmente la richesse et la production de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci terreno da campeggio per incrementare la ricchezza e la produzione della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Trailer Park by zwiększyć produkcję i bogactwo w Twoich miastach.

TEXT.English: A trailer park is a semi-permanent or permanent area for mobile homes or travel trailers. The main reasons for living in such trailer parks are the often lower cost compared to other housing, and the ability to move to a new area more quickly and easily, for example when changing jobs to another part of the country taking the mobile home/trailer with them. Ironically, this type of housing is very profitable for the manufacturers.
TEXT.Italian: Un terreno da campeggio è una zona semi-permanente o permanente per case mobili o roulotte. I motivi principali per vivere in tali terreni sono il costo spesso inferiore rispetto ad altre abitazioni, e la capacità di muoversi in una nuova area più rapidamente e facilmente, ad esempio quando si cambia lavoro in un'altra parte del paese si porta con sè la casa mobile/roulotte. Ironia della sorte, questo tipo di abitazioni è molto redditizio per i produttori.
TEXT.Polish: Przyczepa kempingowa - pojazd drogowy, bez wlasnego silnika, ciagniety przez inny pojazd mechaniczny, przewaznie samochód, ciagnik drogowy z przeznaczeniem do mieszkania. Przyczepa kempingowa wyposazona jest przewaznie w miejsce do spania, lazienke oraz kuchenke. W Polsce jedynym producentem przyczep kempingowych jest firma Niewiadów. Do czolowych zagranicznych producentów naleza Burstner, Knaus i Adria.

TEXT.English: Housing (Homeless)
TEXT.Italian: Abitazioni (Senzatetto)
TEXT.Polish: Domostwa (Bezdomność)

TEXT.English: You sleep outside.
TEXT.German: führt zu Unzufriedenheit und Krankheit, ein Zustand der schleunigst behoben werden sollte
TEXT.Italian: Le persone dormono all'aperto.
TEXT.Polish: Twoi ludzie spia pod golym niebem.

TEXT.English: Homelessness describes the condition of people without a regular dwelling. People who are homeless are most often unable to acquire and maintain regular, safe, secure, and adequate housing, or lack "fixed, regular, and adequate night-time residence." The legal definition of "homeless" varies from country to country, or among different entities or institutions in the same country or region.
TEXT.German: Von [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obdachlosigkeit[COLOR_REVERT] spricht man, wenn Menschen über keinen (festen) Wohnsitz verfügen und im Freien übernachten müssen. Während für diese Wohnsituation bei C2C (noch) gar keine festen Unterkünfte in der Stadt existieren dürfen, sind in der Regel nur Teile der Gesellschaft ohne Obdach. Die häufigsten Gründe dafür sind Mietschulden und Zwangsräumungen, Verlust des Wohnraums durch Naturkatastrophen oder Kriege, Arbeitslosigkeit, Krankheit, Gefängnisaufenthalte oder Vertreibung und Migration. Bei Kinderobdachlosigkeit spielt neben materieller Not der Familie oft auch die Flucht aus zu engen Wohnverhältnissen, vor Konflikten, Gewalt oder Missbrauch eine Rolle.
TEXT.Italian: I senzatetto sono persone senza fissa dimora. I senzatetto sono molto spesso incapaci di ottenere e mantenere un'abitazione regolare, sicura ed adeguata, e manacano di una residenza per la notte regolare ed adeguata. La definizione di senzatetto varia a seconda delle leggi, delle etnie e delle diverse nazioni.
TEXT.Polish: Bezdomność - w ujeciu socjologicznym problem spoleczny (zjawisko spoleczne), charakteryzujacy sie brakiem miejsca zamieszkania (brakiemdomu).

TEXT.English: Housing (Sorority House)
TEXT.Italian: Abitazioni (Casa della sorellanza)
TEXT.Polish: Domostwa (Akademiki)

TEXT.English: Build Sorority House to increase your cities wealth and production.
TEXT.French: Construisez des [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Habitations (Sororité)[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la richesse et la production de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci una casa della sorellanza per incrementare la ricchezza e la produzione della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Sorority House by zwiększyć produkcję i bogactwo w Twoich miastach.

TEXT.English: The Independent Order of Odd Fellows, also known as the three link fraternity, was the first organization to form a woman's auxiliary when it formed the Daughters of Rebekah in 1851 but the term sorority was not yet coined during that time. However, many of the first societies for women were not modeled as fraternities, but were woman's versions of the common Latin literary societies.
TEXT.Italian: L'Independent Order of Odd Fellows, fu la prima sorellanza che formò un'organizzazione femminile, quando fondò le Daughters of Rebekah nel 1851. Il termine sorellanza venne però coniato molto più tardi. In ogni caso, la maggior parte di queste prime società non era organizzata come le confraternite, ma piuttosto erano versioni femminili delle società letterarie latine.
TEXT.Polish: Dom studencki (dom akademicki, pot. akademik) - obiekt mieszkalny dla studentów w czasie studiów wyzszych, bedacy pod nadzorem uczelni. Na terenie domów studenckich zastosowanie maja takie same przepisy, jak na terenie uczelni (pewna autonomia).

TEXT.English: Housing (Tree Hollow)
TEXT.Polish: Domostwa (Dziuple)

TEXT.English: Find a Tree Hollow to protect you from the elements.
A Tree Hollow is a type of natural shelter.
TEXT.Polish: Dziupla to naturalne schronienie.

TEXT.English: Housing (Animal Burrow)
TEXT.Polish: Domostwa (Nory Zwierząt)

TEXT.English: Find an Animal Burrow to protect you from the elements.
An Animal Burrow is a type of natural shelter.
TEXT.Polish: Nora - podziemna kryjówka zwierzęca, jama mająca zaspokoić elementarna potrzebę schronienia, bedaca biologicznie uksztaltowanym warunkiem rozwoju organizmów. Okreslenie nora jest uzywane glównie do okreslenia kryjówek zwierzat ladowych np. borsuka, lisa, lecz stanowi takze okreslenie na miejsca schronienia zwierzat wodnych oraz ptakówgniazdujacych w jamach wykopanych w ziemi. Zazwyczaj nory sa tworzone przez dane zwierzeta, lecz czasem utworzone przez jedno zwierze bywa wykorzystywane przez przedstawicieli innego gatunku. W ten sposób lisywykorzystuja nory borsuków.

TEXT.English: Camp (Seal)
TEXT.Italian: Campo dei cacciatori di foche
TEXT.Polish: Obóz Łowców Fok

TEXT.English: Build a Seal Hunter's Camp to increase your cities wealth and food.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Camp de Chasseurs de phoques[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la nourriture et la richesse de votre ville.
TEXT.German: Build a Seal Hunter's Campto increase your cities wealth and food.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un campo dei cacciatori di foche per incrementare la produzione di cibo e la ricchezza della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Seal Hunter's Camp to increase your cities wealth and food.

TEXT.English: Many fur seal species were heavily exploited by commercial sealers, especially during the 19th century when their fur was highly valued.
TEXT.Italian: Molte specie di foche vennero cacciate intensamente per fini commerciali soprattutto durante il 19° secolo, quando la loro pelliccia era ritenuta di grande valore.
TEXT.Polish: Fokowate, foki (Phocidae) - rodzina drapieznych ssaków morskich zaliczana do pletwonogich (Pinnipedia), obejmujaca 19 gatunków.

TEXT.English: Camp (Deer)
TEXT.Italian: Campo dei cacciatori di cervi
TEXT.Polish: Obóz Łowców Jeleni

TEXT.English: Build a Deer Hunter's Camp to increase your cities food and wealth.
TEXT.French: Construisez un [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Camp de Chasseurs de Cervidés[COLOR_REVERT] pour augmenter la nourriture et la richesse de votre ville.
TEXT.Italian: Costruisci un campo dei cacciatori di cervi per incrementare la produzione di cibo e la ricchezza della tua città.
TEXT.Polish: Zbuduj Deer Hunter's Camp by zwiększyć produkcję żywności oraz bogactwo w Twoich miastach.
